Name: Body Discovery
About the game: Educational journey Through the body in 8 Languages. - You can see: 1-complete female body and run through it 2- how the circulatory, digestive, urinary, respiratory and the auditory organs from the inside look like' 3- Names of the organs and the tissues 4- Information about some common disorders 5- How these disorders affect the organs and the tissues 6- these disorders are: - Cases of the White tongue - Cases of the (Strawberry) Red tongue - Cases of the Black hairy tongue - Causes of dental caries (Tooth decay) - pharyngitis - Causes of the heartburn - Achalasia - Esophageal varices - Schatzki Ring - Causes of the stomach (Peptic) ulcer - Causes of the diarrhea - Causes of the constipation - the colon polyp - Earwax blockage - Otitis media - Asthma - Smoker's lung
